item.title: 蓬勃发展的剑桥暴露了英格兰不断扩大的贫富差距
item.description:
这座著名的大学城被各政治派别视为振兴奄奄一息的英国经济的典范。但并非所有人都能分享它的成功。【原文：

The famed university town is seen across the political spectrum as a model for how to revive the moribund UK economy. But not everyone is sharing in its success.

】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯最大的 ETF 基金将追踪中国股票
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的一家投资公司不久将推出该国最大的交易所交易基金，追踪香港股市，这是中国与这个石油资源丰富的王国之间金融联系更加紧密的最新迹象。【原文：A Saudi Arabian investment firm will soon launch the country’s largest exchange traded fund to track Hong Kong equities, the latest sign of closer financial ties between China and the oil-rich kingdom.】

item.title: 债券市场担心美国共和党大选的 "未知数
item.description:
他们对特朗普肆无忌惮地减税导致赤字增加的前景深恶痛绝，即使股票可能从中受益。【原文：

They deeply dislike the prospect of unchecked Trump tax cuts driving up deficits, even if stocks are likely to benefit.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行霍尔茨曼称 12 月可能降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，即使通胀上行的风险依然存在，欧洲中央银行今年仍很有可能将利率再下调 25 个基点。【原文：The European Central Bank will most likely lower interest rates by another 25 basis points this year even as upside inflation risks linger, said Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 全球投资者看淡动荡，加大对肯尼亚资产的押注
item.description: 多年来最严重的政治动荡并没有让肯尼亚表现最佳的货币和不断上扬的债券和股票市场黯然失色，因为投资者关注的是不断改善的经济和健康的资本流入。【原文：The worst political upheaval in years hasn’t taken the shine off Kenya’s top-performing currency and rallying bond and stock markets as investors focus on an improving economy and healthy capital inflows.】

item.title: S&P 将 2024 年全球债券发行量预测上调至 9 万亿美元
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）表示，今年全球债券销售额将攀升17%，达到约9万亿美元，第三季度的势头可能会持续下去，并上调了之前的预期。【原文：Global bond sales will climb 17% this year to about $9 trillion with momentum from the third quarter likely sustained, S&P Global Ratings said, revising up a previous estimate.】

item.title: 中国煤炭市场持续疲软，煤炭买家将减少发货量
item.description: 中国煤炭进口商今年在煤炭贸易中亏损，因此希望减少煤炭运输量。【原文：Chinese coal importers are looking to reduce shipments after they lost money on the trade this year.】

item.title: 预计到 2030 年香港私人财富资产将激增至 23 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，香港管理的私人财富资产可能在六年内翻一番，达到 2.3 万亿美元，这个亚洲金融中心预计将超过瑞士，成为全球最大的跨境财富中心。【原文：Private wealth assets under management in Hong Kong may nearly double to $2.3 trillion in six years, according to Bloomberg Intelligence, with the Asian financial hub projected to surpass Switzerland as the world’s top cross-border wealth center.】

item.title: 500 亿美元资金池帮助印度抵御外资外流
item.description: 在印度股市遭遇自 2020 年初以来最大的外资抛售之际，本地资金的大量流入正在拯救印度股市。【原文：Surging inflows from local funds are coming to the rescue of Indian stocks as they witness the biggest foreign selloff since early 2020.】

item.title: 散户投资者抓住印度股市罕见下跌的机会
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 最近发生碰撞事故的黑暗舰队油轮驶往中国
item.description: 最近在东南亚发生空难的一艘黑船队油轮正在驶往中国的途中。【原文：A dark-fleet oil tanker that was recently involved in a crash in Southeast Asia is now on its way to China.】

item.title: 据说埃利奥特和西南航空公司接近达成和解，以避免董事会之争
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）和美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management and Southwest Airlines Co. are nearing a settlement that would avoid a proxy fight for control of the carrier’s board, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亿万富翁的性传奇是澳大利亚首席执行官们的最新丑闻
item.description: 澳大利亚科技界亿万富翁理查德-怀特（Richard White）涉嫌以性换取投资的丑闻，只是该国最近发生的一起企业灾难，该国正迅速失去作为一个管理严格、治理标准严苛的市场的声誉。【原文：The alleged sex-for-investment scandal embroiling Australian tech billionaire Richard White is just the latest corporate calamity in a country fast losing its reputation as a tightly-regulated market with strict governance standards.】

item.title: Amundi 和贝莱德加入竞争，印度债券 ETF 将吸引数十亿资金
item.description: 世界上一些最大的交易所交易基金提供商正在争夺未来几年有望通过将印度债券纳入主要全球指数而流入印度的数十亿美元资金。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest exchange-traded fund providers are battling it out for the billions of dollars expected to flow into Indian bonds in coming years through their inclusion in key global indexes.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级养老基金将增加数十亿美元私人资产
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的两家养老基金计划增加价值数十亿美元的非上市资产，因为该行业已经庞大的私人投资组合所带来的金融风险日益受到警告。【原文：Australia’s two largest pension funds plan to add billions of dollars worth of unlisted assets as warnings mount about the financial risks posed by the industry’s already huge private portfolios.】

item.title: 泰国投资银行（BOT）发出不再降息的信号，外国人抛售泰国债券
item.description: 随着政治风险的增加以及央行抑制进一步降息的前景，泰国政府债券的离岸抛售可能会扩大。【原文：Offshore selling of Thai government bonds may extend as political risks mount and the central bank damps prospects of further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本日本通运希望在印度进行收购
item.description: 日本第二大包裹公司日本通运控股公司（Nippon Express Holdings Inc.【原文：Nippon Express Holdings Inc. is seeking companies to buy in India to speed up its growth in the fast-growing economy, an executive in charge of overseas operations at Japan’s second-largest parcel company said.】

item.title: 地平线机器人公司 6.96 亿美元首次公开募股后在港上市，涨幅达 28
item.description: 地平线机器人公司（Horizon Robotics Inc.【原文：Shares of Horizon Robotics Inc. jumped 28% early in their trading debut in Hong Kong Thursday, adding to a flurry of deals that signal the end of a slump in initial public offerings in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 印度首席执行官数月施压后习近平与莫迪取得突破
item.description: 2020 年的边境冲突造成至少 20 名印度士兵死亡后，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪采取了一系列措施阻止来自中国的投资，甚至在某些领域比美国走得更远。现在，新德里已经意识到他可能做得太过分了。【原文：After a 2020 border clash killed at least 20 Indian soldiers, Prime Minister Narendra Modi took a range of steps to block investment from China, even going further than the US in some areas. Now there’s a recognition in New Delhi that he may have gone too far.】

item.title: 铂金股权投资支持的英迈公司首次公开募股（IPO）获得 4.09 亿美元融资
item.description: 2024年9月16日，星期一，美国纽约，纽约证券交易所（NYSE）。为本周美联储决议做准备的华尔街交易员们继续推动科技大盘股轮番出局，而科技大盘股一直是股市牛市的动力。摄影师：Yuki Iwamura/Bloomberg【原文：The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York, US, on Monday, Sept. 16, 2024. Wall Street traders gearing up for this weeks Federal Reserve decision kept driving a rotation out of the tech megacaps that have powered the bull market in stocks. Photographer: Yuki Iwamura/Bloomberg】

item.title: 债券收益率上升，黄金从历史新高回落后上扬
item.description: 黄金在创下 11 周来最大单日跌幅后小幅上涨，原因是国债收益率上升拖累了金价，投资者在接近历史最高水平时抛售。【原文：Gold rose slightly after its biggest daily drop in 11 weeks, as higher Treasury yields weighed on prices and investors sold near record-high levels.】

item.title: 在两极分化的世界中，巴西不愿在中美之间做出选择
item.description: 在这个日益两极分化的世界上，巴西领导人正在走一条精细的外交路线，既要吸引美国和中国，又要保护自己的国家免受任何潜在的打击。【原文：Brazilian leaders are walking a fine diplomatic line to appeal to both the US and China and shield their nation from any potential blowback in an increasingly polarized world.】

item.title: 石油价格下跌后趋于平稳，供应前景和中东局势成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于交易商对中东紧张局势和进入 2025 年的市场平衡前景进行了评估，石油在周三回落后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied, after retreating on Wednesday, as traders assessed tensions in the Middle East and the outlook for market balances heading into 2025.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，SK 海力士利润创历史新高
item.description: SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：SK Hynix Inc. posted record quarterly profit and revenue, reflecting strong demand for the memory chips used with Nvidia Corp. processors for artificial intelligence development.】

item.title: 香港 IPO 使中国软件大亨的财富增至近 10 亿美元
item.description: 据余凯的导师之一沃尔克-特雷斯普（Volker Tresp）教授介绍，余凯在慕尼黑大学攻读计算机科学博士学位期间，是一位雄心勃勃的研究人员，他表明自己希望成为该领域的佼佼者。【原文：While studying for his computer science Ph.D. at the University of Munich, Kai Yu stood out as an ambitious researcher who showed he wanted to be a top name in his field, according to Professor Volker Tresp, one of his supervisors.】

item.title: 首席财务官称加州大学捐款突破 40 亿美元
item.description: 加州大学首席财务官内森-布罗斯特罗姆（Nathan Brostrom）在周三的一次会议上表示，加州大学系统在上一财年首次获得了超过 40 亿美元的私人捐款。【原文：The University of California system brought in more than $4 billion in private donations for the first time during the last fiscal year, Nathan Brostrom, its chief financial officer, said at a conference on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将下跌，日元在走软后持稳：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市出现回落，而国债收益率则推高了美元，因为交易商缩减了对美联储减息的押注。【原文：Equities in Asia were primed for a pullback, while Treasury yields pushed the dollar higher as traders scaled back bets on Federal Reserve cuts.】

item.title: 矿产资源公司的埃里森面临澳大利亚监察机构的调查
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监督机构正在调查矿产资源有限公司及其富豪创始人克里斯-埃里森（Chris Ellison），原因是他未申报付款以避税。【原文：Australia’s corporate watchdog is investigating Mineral Resources Ltd. and its tycoon founder, Chris Ellison, after he made undeclared payments that avoided tax.】

item.title: 英超联赛面临英国政府前所未有的监管
item.description: 新的足球监管机构将有权决定英格兰利润丰厚的英超联赛如何向小俱乐部分配资金，从而使监管机构对这项全国最受欢迎的运动拥有更大的控制权。【原文：A new football regulator will have the power to decide how England’s lucrative Premier League distributes money to smaller clubs, giving the regulator greater control over the country’s most popular sport.】

item.title: 精神航空寻求破产作为与边疆航空合作的途径
item.description: 据知情人士透露，精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines Inc.【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. is in talks with Frontier Group Holdings Inc. about filing for bankruptcy to facilitate a takeover by the rival discount carrier, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
